ItemTooltips.stout_shield: Aborbs alot of damage in lane. Can upgrade later into a vanguard.
ItemTooltips.branches: Cheap way to boost your laning phase stats, upgrade later into magic wand.
ItemTooltips.magic_wand: Always good to a have, will save you alot.
ItemTooltips.flask: Regen is always good in lane.
ItemTooltips.tango: Regen is always good in lane.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_health: Try to purchase this asap from the sideshop. It will give you great lane sustain.
ItemTooltips.power_treads: Gives amazing stats for slardar, attack speed, damage, and health.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: You will want the magic immunity to get bash, and smash the best you can during fights.
ItemTooltips.vanguard: Buy vanguard if enemy team has a good amount of basic attack damage.
ItemTooltips.hood_of_defiance: Replace vanguard if the enemy team has alot of magic damage.Allows you to shrug off magic damage and smash those wizards. Can upgrade later to pipe of insight.
ItemTooltips.armlet: Lots of damage, lots of health, overall just a great item.

AbilityTooltips.slardar_sprint: Very usefull early and mid game. You will always be able to run people down, or escape. Just be carefull because you will take extra damage.
AbilityTooltips.slardar_slithereen_crush: Great damage and stun, always max this first.
AbilityTooltips.slardar_bash: This allows you to wreck people.
AbilityTooltips.slardar_amplify_damage: This is why slardar is a monster. Amazing negative armor, helps everyone on the team. Also great against invis heroes.
